ygData.subject: Re: Mesmerize
ygData.msgSnippet: Lull and all of it equvilant spell lower the aggrosive radius of monsters lower the chance that all linked monster will rush you when you attack one. Mesmerize
ygData.messageBody:
Lull and all of it equvilant spell lower the aggrosive radius of monsters
lower the chance that all linked monster will rush you when you attack one.
Mesmerize makes the monster stop and forget you for about 15 seconds, there
is like a 10% chance the monster will totally forget about you and you are
no longer on its "shit list" if not after about 15 seconds it then attacks
you again. During this 15 second time period you can cast ANY spell on the
monsters as long as it doesnt do any dmg, so you can enfeeble em make them
slow or what ever, just cant hit them, as soon as you do, they attack you or
who ever hit them. The spell that makes them spin is whirl till you hurl,
this spell makes it so the monster can not move or attack for about 12
seconds, you can blast em and do what ever and they are helpless.

Leaokk
-----Original Message-----
From: Magik <aarongb@...>
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 11:07 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Mesmerize


>From: "Magik" <aarongb@...>
>
>from what I remember......and Im sure Ill be corrected if Im not.....but
>Lull lowers the aggression of the creature and lowers the frenzying
>radius.......where Mesmerize disturbs the monsters shit list and makes him
>spin in a circle making not be able to hit you.......I think this is the
>correct spell.....Ill check it out and repost a correction if Im
wrong......
>
>
>
>Dymond no more......
>
>
>Neurosiz
